title: ‘No question of…’: Maharashtra home minister on loudspeakers amid azaan row - Hindustan Times
content:
1. ‘No question of…’: Maharashtra home minister on loudspeakers amid azaan row  Hindustan Times
  2. "Use Loudspeakers For...": Aaditya Thackeray's Dig At Uncle Raj Thackeray  NDTV
  3. MNS Writes Letter To Home Minister Amit Shah, Demands To Remove Loudspeakers From Mosques | Breaking  India Today
  4. Rise of new `Hindu Owaisi`: Sanjay Raut`s veiled swipe at Raj Thackeray  Zee News
  5. Azaan Row Intensifies: MNS Issues Ultimatum To Shiv Sena To Remove Loudspeakers From Mosques  TIMES NOW
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Addressing a rally at Mumbai's Shivaji Park on April 3, Maharashtra Navnirman Sena chief Raj Thackeray asked the state government to remove the loudspeakers from mosques and warned of "putting loudspeakers in front of the mosques and play Hanuman Chalisa"
